entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
